meanings.definition: A strip of paper coated with a sticky substance to trap flies.
meanings.sent1: I hung up some flypapers to catch the pesky flies in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The store sells various types of flypapers to help control the fly population.
meanings.sent3: The flypapers were so effective that the flies started avoiding the kitchen altogether!
meanings.sent4: The flypapers acted like a spider's web, ensnaring any unsuspecting fly that landed on them.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the flypapers covered in trapped flies was both satisfying and gross.

meanings.definition: A substance used to attract and kill flies.
meanings.sent1: The potent smell of the flypapers lured the flies in and sealed their fate.
meanings.sent2: She placed the flypapers strategically around the picnic area to keep the flies away.
meanings.sent3: The flies seemed to have a party around the flypapers, not realizing the danger they were in.
meanings.sent4: The flypapers were like a deadly trap, enticing the flies with their sweet scent.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of the flypapers in eliminating flies was truly remarkable.
